text: The Bongolava mouse lemur (Microcebus bongolavensis) is a species of mouse lemur endemic to Madagascar. It lives in western deciduous forest within a limited range, including Bongolava Forest and Ambodimahabibo Forest between the Sofia River and the Mahajamba River. It is a relatively large mouse lemur with a total length of , including 15 to 17 centimeters of tail. ==References== Category:Mouse lemurs Category:Mammals described in 2007
title: Bongolava mouse lemur
